name: Fractal Screen
description:
A platforming game featuring fractal and screen made for BGDJam in 72 hours with the theme "recursion"

in this game you must beat many levels by looking at a screen

Controls

A&D: Move left and right

Space: Jump

Hold Spacebar : Jump Higher

R: Reset the level

Esc: Return to main menu

recommended aspect ratio 16:9

credits:

Programming & Art

Vincentius Arianto

Music

Vintage Elecro pop loop

by Frankum on freesound.org

SFX
